Record.Description: A group of painful oral symptoms associated with a burning or similar sensation. There is usually a significant organic component with a degree of functional overlay; it is not limited to the psychophysiologic group of disorders.
A condition characterized by a burning or tingling sensation on the lips, tongue, or entire mouth.
